title: The Fifth Sister
description: The most gorgeous guy in the world just moved in across the hallway from Glo, The Fifth Sister. He says he is a vampire, and it gets better. He says he's a vampire slayer, and guess what? She is too!The world of Parched keeps turning in this fourth installment of the novel series. We meet Glo Slater, the fifth sister of The House of Benel. She's a waitress in Cleveland who's just about to discover a destiny which leads her into the arms of a vampire named Finn, to a small town on the verge of being wiped out of existence by vampires and to a strange new world named Jari where she learns her life will never be the same again.
author: Z.L. Arkadie
